$\textbf{Question 1:}$

```{r}
x <- plan1[,1:3]
k <- c(1:6)
sizek <- 8
appartennace <- matrix(rep(NA,sizek * 6),nrow = length(k) ,ncol=sizek)
  for (i in 1:sizek){
    for(j in 1:6){
        appartennace[j,i] <- un_dedans(x[i,],k[j])
    }
  }
# probabilitÃ© de chaque k
NT <- length(appartennace)
prob <- rep(NA,length(k))
for (i in 1:length(k)){
  prob[i] <- length(appartennace[i,]) / NT
}
```
